name: @avada/app
description: An AVADA application for Shopify written in Nodejs

scripts.predeploy: yarn workspace @avada/assets run production && yarn workspace @avada/functions run production
scripts.eslint-fix: npm --prefix packages/assets/ run eslint-fix && npm --prefix packages/functions/ run eslint-fix
scripts.start-dev: concurrently "yarn workspace @avada/assets run watch" "yarn workspace @avada/functions run watch"
